title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practice Competencies: Strategic Choices for ICT-Based Higher Education Curriculum Restructuring

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain (80% or more) the consensus-building process among stakeholders when revising curricula using the SCA methodology.
Learners can successfully execute three or more curriculum redesign scenarios using VR tools in simulation environments.
Learners can evaluate conflict management and compromise design skills through team-based decision-making processes.
Learners can quantitatively and qualitatively analyze the impact of revised curricula on learner outcomes and graduation rates.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
